Everyone believes that he/she can complete this game easily; But they soon realize that its difficulty is far beyond their imagination!
----------------------------

Introduction of Zhongyuan Mahjong 2 (Concentration)

*****Game goal
*Find out and remove all same tiles as the reference tile as quickly as possible.

*****Game rules
*One tile is chosen as the reference tile randomly each time.
*You are to find out and remove all same tiles as the reference tile.
*After having removed all same tiles, tap to remove the reference tile.
*Repeat until all tiles are removed.

*****Note: Before games starts, 38 tiles have been chosen and removed, randomly.
